snippet: Thomas Müller scored twice and set up his team’s third goal as Germany defeated host Scotland, 3-2, in Group D and moved to 1 point from automatic qualification.
abstract: Germany defeats Scotland 3-2 in Group D game, getting huge lift from Thomas Muller, who scored twice and set up winning goal; team moves 1 point closer to automatic 2016 European Championship qualification; other soccer scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Müller scored twice and set up his team’s third goal as Germany defeated host Scotland, 3-2, in Group D and moved to 1 point from automatic qualification.

headline.main: Germany Edges Scotland in Euro Qualifying
